title: AirBNBinVegas
author: AirBNBinVegas
created_time: July 12, 2023, 07:03:17 PMLast edit: October 29, 2024, 10:10:22 PM by AirBNBinVegas
content: AirBnB in Las Vegas,NV❤️ us on AirbnbFull Video Reel on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/reel/1742200539940984up to 10 Guest4 bedrooms / 3 restrooms /  6 beds : https://airbnb.com/h/inlasvegasking bed, parking, 10mins Strip-Raiders-Airporthttps://i.postimg.cc/NfcrJ3yM/Fabulous-4-BR-home-located-10mins-from-everything-Houses-for-Rent-in-Las-Vegas-Nevada-United-States-A.pngGo to AirBNB link below, select your dates you like and not pay but make an "inquiry" I'll see your total and give you 15% discount from what airbnb says if paid by crypto. I will block dates on airbnb. PM here or Airbnb appFind me on AirBnB: https://airbnb.com/h/inlasvegasQuoteMy short-term rental in Las Vegas is undeniably the best choice for travelers seeking an exceptional accommodation experience. Here are several reasons why my property stands out among the rest:Prime Location: Situated in a prime location in the heart of Las Vegas, my rental offers unparalleled convenience. Guests have easy access to renowned attractions, including world-class casinos, entertainment venues, shopping centers, and fine dining establishments. The central location ensures that guests can make the most of their time in this vibrant city.Luxurious Amenities: My rental is meticulously designed to provide a luxurious and comfortable stay. Guests are greeted with tastefully furnished interiors, high-quality linens, and modern appliances. The property boasts amenities such as a fully equipped kitchen, state-of-the-art entertainment systems, high-speed internet. Every detail has been carefully considered to create a memorable experience for guests.Impeccable Cleanliness: Cleanliness is of utmost importance in my short-term rental. The property is professionally cleaned before each guest's arrival, ensuring a spotless and hygienic environment. I prioritize the health and well-being of my guests, and meticulous attention is given to maintaining the highest standards of cleanliness throughout their stay.Competitive Pricing: Despite offering a top-notch experience, my short-term rental is competitively priced. I believe that luxury and comfort should be accessible to all, and I strive to provide excellent value for money. Guests can indulge in a high-end accommodation experience without breaking the bank.Trust and Safety: I prioritize the safety and security of my guests. My property is equipped with robust security measures, including secure access systems and surveillance cameras outside. Additionally, I maintain open and transparent communication to foster trust with my guests, ensuring peace of mind throughout their stay.In conclusion, my short-term rental in Las Vegas offers the epitome of luxury, comfort, and personalized hospitality. With its prime location, luxurious amenities, impeccable cleanliness, and positive guest reviews, it stands as the premier choice for travelers seeking an extraordinary accommodation experience in the vibrant city of Las Vegas.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Nice.  A 20% discount puts it around $120 a night.  Not a bad price at all, especially for the amount of rooms.  I didn't look too much into the location and the yard isn't going to host a rager, but still cool to think that you can get a house in Vegas for the night for some sats.  Thanks for posting this here.  If I'm ever in need of a place to stay in Vegas for the night I'll try to remember to keep you in mind.  Would be great if you could list that Bitcoin was accepted on AirBNB.

comments.author: AirBNBinVegas
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on September 01, 2023, 09:05:47 PMNice.  A 20% discount puts it around $120 a night.  Not a bad price at all, especially for the amount of rooms.  I didn't look too much into the location and the yard isn't going to host a rager, but still cool to think that you can get a house in Vegas for the night for some sats.  Thanks for posting this here.  If I'm ever in need of a place to stay in Vegas for the night I'll try to remember to keep you in mind.  Would be great if you could list that Bitcoin was accepted on AirBNB.wish i could, not allowed to sell outside its own platform. about 120 a night depending when, price is changing.

With its prime location, luxurious amenities, impeccable cleanliness, and positive guest reviews, it stands as the premier choice for travelers seeking an extraordinary accommodation experience in the vibrant city of Las Vegas.Cool offer for guests visiting, I must say, Vegas is a home to many on a brief stay and accomodation is going to be one hell of a concern and getting to pay in bitcoin is just best for a tourist who has to bother less about the convetional payment system. Again, the hurdle of carrying cash is almost obsolete to some people but for conventional systems but enabling bitcoin payment is just a life saver.To get more people to inbibe this, you might consider using the payment option as a great deal on your ads and see more offers coming in, it could translate to business expansion for you if you decide to dwell in that are of business.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: AirBNBinVegas on July 28, 2024, 03:20:47 PMNow added: Pac-man arcade and EV Charger That’s a game changer for me. Both great additions. I may have to check this out when I go visit the Sphere. My questions are as follows. Do we have to use AirBnB or could we go through you directly to cut out all the crazy cleaning and website fees? Is the EV charger free to use? Do you accept escrow on the forum for these stays?

comments.author: AirBNBinVegas
comments.body: I will answer your question as it followsq1. Do we have to use AirBnB or could we go through you directly to cut out all the crazy cleaning and website fees? a1. Hi! Yes, you're welcome to book directly with me if you'd like to bypass the Airbnb fees only not the cleaning. Once payment is confirmed with a deposit (damage deposit is required) sent back once housekeepers gives us the clear (24hrs or less), I will block the dates on the Airbnb app.q2. Is the EV charger free to use? a2. Yes, the EV charger is free to use! There are two levels available: the normal charge, which is free, and a fast charge, which is 7 times faster and comes with an extra fee.https://www.airbnbinlasvegas.com/ev-chargerq3. Do you accept escrow on the forum for these stays?a3. Sorry, but payment must be confirmed and cleared before the stay.
